Content: @SHossain have you ever seen komodod "get stuck" when starting up, i.e.: no debug.log output, no stdout/stderr, nothing?

Content: previously a daemon crashed, leaving a .lock

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: and then i deleted all chainstate and necessary files, to do a fresh sync

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: I didn't realize .lock was there, so I started it. And it seems to be stuck, in an infinite loop of waiting. It's not using the CPU

Content: this seems like a bug. Instead, it should tell me there is a lock file, somewhere

Content: and probably exit

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @barv "overwintered" means Zcash transaction format version 4, the current, which Sapling requires on all known ZEC forks. nExpiryHeight was added to transaction format, a few other small things

Author: phm87#7395
Content: I though that overwinter was version 3 and sapling was version 4

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: hmmm

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: magicbean, sprout, sapling, blossom are Network Upgrade names

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: sapling is not a transaction format

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: https://z.cash/upgrade/overwinter/
